4.3 DUIM-DCs Module

default-foreground-setter

Generic function

Summary

Sets the default foreground.

Signature

default-foreground-setter foreground object => foreground

Arguments

foreground
An instance of type <ink>.

object
An instance of type <object>.

Values

foreground
An instance of type <ink>.

Library

duim-dcs

Module

duim-dcs

Description

Sets the default foreground for object.

See also

brush-fill-rule, page 128.

default-background-setter, page 144

default-foreground, page 145

Functional Developer Library Reference: DUIM - 3 Dec 1998
